<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Generating checksum for the ecc_agent_script_file without attachments</description>
        <name>Generate Checksum For Script File</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var powershellExtensions = ["ps1", "psm1", "psc1", "ps1xml", "psd1", "pssc", "psrc", "cdxml"];
var scriptGr = new GlideRecord('ecc_agent_script_file');
scriptGr.addQuery('active', true);
scriptGr.addQuery('directory', false);
scriptGr.addQuery('use_attachment', false).addOrCondition('use_attachment','');
scriptGr.query();
while (scriptGr.next()) {
    var scriptValue = scriptGr.script + '';
    var resp = {
        'result': {}
    };
    var addUTFBOM = powershellExtensions.indexOf(scriptGr.name.split(".")[1]) >= 0;
    resp.result.field_value = {
        '#cdata': new GlideStringUtil().escapeHTML(scriptValue)
    };
    var doc = new XMLHelper().toXMLDoc(resp, true);
    try {
        var escapeHTMLScript = GlideXMLUtil.getText(doc, "//result/field_value");
        var unEscapeHTMLScript = new GlideStringUtil().unEscapeHTML(escapeHTMLScript);
        var checkSum = addUTFBOM ? new GlideDigest().getMD5Base64('\uFEFF' + unEscapeHTMLScript) : new GlideDigest().getMD5Base64(unEscapeHTMLScript);
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Checksum generation failed for the file " + scriptGr.name + " with stack trace\n" + ex);
    }
    scriptGr.setValue('checksum', checkSum);
    scriptGr.update();
}]]></script>
